User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the HearMeOut application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity.

displayName.description: The user's display name, shown in rooms and overlays.

profileImageUrl.description: URL to the user's profile image.

discordId.description: The user's Discord ID, if linked.

twitchId.description: The user's Twitch ID, if linked.

Room.title: Room
Room.description: Represents a voice chat room within the HearMeOut application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Room entity.

ownerId.description: Reference to User. (Relationship: User 1:N Room). The user ID of the room owner.

djId.description: The user ID of the current DJ, who claimed control via the UI. This can be empty if no one is the DJ.

djDisplayName.description: The display name of the current DJ. Denormalized for easy display.

isPrivate.description: Indicates whether the room is private or public.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the room was created.

playlist.description: The ordered list of media items in the room's playlist.

currentTrackId.description: The ID of the currently playing track in the playlist.

isPlaying.description: Indicates if music is currently playing in the room.

bannedUsers.description: A list of user IDs that are banned from this room.

PlaylistItem.title: Playlist Item
PlaylistItem.description: Represents a single item in a room's playlist.

RoomParticipant.title: Room Participant
RoomParticipant.description: Represents a user currently in a voice chat room. A subset of the main User profile.

photoURL.description: URL to the user's profile image.

isSpeaking.description: Indicates if the user is currently speaking.

isMutedByHost.description: Indicates if the user has been muted by the room host.

isMuted.description: Indicates if the user has muted their own microphone.

Media.title: Media
Media.description: Represents media files (YouTube URLs or uploaded files) that can be played in a room.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Media entity.

roomId.description: Reference to Room. (Relationship: Room 1:N Media). The ID of the room where the media is played.

url.description: The URL of the media (YouTube URL or storage URL).

uploadedByUserId.description: Reference to User. (Relationship: User 1:N Media).  The ID of the user who uploaded the media, if applicable.

duration.description: The duration of the media in seconds.

ModerationLog.title: ModerationLog
ModerationLog.description: Represents a log entry for moderation events within a room.

id.description: Unique identifier for the ModerationLog entity.

roomId.description: Reference to Room. (Relationship: Room 1:N ModerationLog). The ID of the room where the event occurred.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when the moderation event occurred.

sentimentScore.description: The sentiment score of the conversation at the time of the event.

flaggedTerms.description: A list of terms that triggered the moderation event.

description.description: A description of the moderation event.

ChatMessage.title: Chat Message
ChatMessage.description: Represents a single chat message sent in a room.

userId.description: The UID of the user who sent the message.

displayName.description: The display name of the user at the time of sending.

createdAt.description: The server timestamp when the message was created.

params.name: userId

params.name: roomId
params.description: The unique ID of the room.

definition.description: Stores users who are currently in a room. The userId is the same as the auth UID.

params.name: roomId
params.description: The unique ID of the room.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique ID of the user.

definition.description: Stores media files associated with a room.

params.name: roomId
params.description: The unique ID of the room.

params.name: mediaId
params.description: The unique ID of the media.

definition.description: Stores moderation logs for each room.

params.name: roomId
params.description: The unique ID of the room.

params.name: moderationLogId
params.description: The unique ID of the moderation log.

definition.description: Stores chat messages for a room.

params.name: roomId

params.name: messageId
params.description: The unique ID of the chat message.

firestore.reasoning: The Firestore structure is designed to ensure security, scalability, and ease of debugging. A subcollection for `users` within each `room` (`/rooms/{roomId}/users/{userId}`) is used for efficient querying of participants in real-time. This denormalized approach is better for this app's use case than a separate top-level collection for room-user relationships. Other collections like `media`, `moderation_logs`, and `messages` are also subcollections of rooms, keeping all room-related data logically grouped.
